entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , McCreary
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:57 PM CST Thursday 09 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 09 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind becoming east 20 km/h in the morning. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 21 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 09 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Light snow. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Light snow beginning near midnight. Wind east 30 km/h. Low minus 8. Wind chill near minus 18. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 09 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 6. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. High minus 6. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 09 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 12. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 12. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 09 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Sunny. High minus 8.
entry.summary: Sunny. High minus 8. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 09 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Clear. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 17. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 09 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: Sunny. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Sunny. High minus 3. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 09 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Cloudy periods. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Cloudy periods. Low minus 9. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 09 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Cloudy. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. High minus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 09 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy periods with 60 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 5. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 09 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High zero.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 09 March 2023
